attributes.action: link any change in MPs wages to the average wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Linking the wage of MPs to the average wage is the fairest way of changing MPs wage. It should be able to go up or down reflecting any changes to the average persons standard of living. An MP is a public servant and should be helping the constituents, but it now seems they care more about their wage packet than the average person.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
